ProjectDescription: This is a Job Portal and it's mainly focused on how easily one can apply for the job. We are try to making this project cause we need to hire develoepr for use and we are depend on different platform. We are try to make our own platform that can help us and others to get their dream job and we can get the best candidates. In this project i am responsible for deveoping frontend using mordern technology React.js & Redux.
ProjectKeypoint: This is a job portal website where candidate can apply for job
People can search for job based on specific country and job title
Admin can edit job also add and delete old job
Everyone have to login then based on his rule he will able to show the details
HR can access the job application and filter those applcations.
Candidates can submit their resume and details when they apply for the job

ProjectDescription: This is a E-Commerce website build with React.js for develop frontend. It have many feature include tour travel and other stuff. I design and develop this website using only React.js and Style component. This is a freelance project that i've worked for my client
ProjectKeypoint: As a e-Commerce website cusomer can easily purchese product from the shop page
People can filter product with different options or different category
Custormar can add to cart product also can delete product from the cart

ProjectDescription: This is an courier webapplication. It's a client project that going to help customer making their order on the courier website
ProjectKeypoint: Admin can add new data, delete customers orders, update it and Able to make the customer active or verified.
Customers are able to make the order, search order based on order number, place or tracking number and download the csv file.
Admin and Customer have separate login and dashboard. Users are able to change the password or recover the password.
Admin is also able to upload csv files for creating new data or modify the existing data.
